str2: But, except, however. Neuter plural of allos; properly, other things, i.e. contrariwise.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Probably akin to phaino through the idea of disclosure; a tone; by implication, an address, saying or language.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
Seventh. Ordinal from hepta; seventh.
From aggello; a messenger; especially an 'angel'; by implication, a pastor.
When, whenever. From hote and an; whenever; also causatively inasmuch as.

parse: Verb - Present Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: A strengthened form of melo; to intend, i.e. Be about to be, do, or suffer something.
To sound a trumpet. From salpigx; to trumpet, i.e. Sound a blast.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of muo; a secret or 'mystery'.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I end, finish, (b) I fulfill, accomplish, (c) I pay. From telos; to end, i.e. Complete, execute, conclude, discharge.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From eu and aggelos; to announce good news especially the gospel.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Genitive Masculine 3rd Person Singular
str2: Himself, herself, itself.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a compound of pro and phemi; a foreteller; by analogy, an inspired speaker; by extension, a poet.
